name: BECIncident
description: Case template for managing business email compromise incidents.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation workflow for a business email compromise.

tasks.title: Identify compromised mailboxes
tasks.description: Review suspicious logins and determine which accounts were affected within the email infrastructure.

tasks.title: Analyze fraudulent activity
tasks.description: Hunt for malicious emails, forwarding rules, and unauthorized wire transfer requests.

tasks.title: Contain and mitigate
tasks.description: Revoke active sessions, force credential resets, and enforce MFA.

tasks.title: Coordinate with finance and legal
tasks.description: Notify the relevant departments and contact financial institutions if funds are at risk.

tasks.title: Notify external parties
tasks.description: Alert customers or vendors who might have received fraudulent emails.

tasks.title: Strengthen email security
tasks.description: Apply advanced configurations (DKIM, DMARC, SPF) and review access policies.

tasks.title: Preserve chain of custody
tasks.description: Preserve email evidence, logs, and supporting artifacts following chain-of-custody procedures.
